java.name: Java
java.comment: Extensive experience in back-end and batch processing, mainly using Spring Boot. Mainly used in professional work.

typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.comment: Developed admin dashboards using Vue.js at work. Also used in personal projects.

python.name: Python
python.comment: Used widely for personal development and scripting.

rust.name: Rust
rust.comment: Used in back-end development at work. Currently still learning.

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.comment: Used in both professional and personal development. Proficient in basic SQL operations.

aws.name: AWS
aws.comment: Experience with basic services. Currently learning more advanced usage.

korean.name: Korean
korean.comment: Able to engage in simple conversations and self-introductions. Continuously self-studying.
korean.detail: Learned Korean as a second foreign language in university. Later rekindled interest due to the virtual idol group '이세계아이돌'. Attracted by the similarities between Korean and Japanese grammar and vocabulary, and the ease of learning through subtitles. Studying through YouTube, VRChat, and Maum. Can handle light conversations and introductions. Familiar with Hangul reading and pronunciation, though vocabulary is limited and skewed toward otaku terms.

chinese.name: Chinese
chinese.comment: Can understand basic daily expressions. Currently learning pronunciation and conversation.
chinese.detail: Studying for a few months. Can read some pinyin, but still struggling with accurate pronunciation. Practicing through Hello Talk with Chinese friends who speak Japanese. Understanding simple phrases like 'go to work' or 'eat a meal' is improving. Reading is getting better, but speaking, listening, and writing remain areas to improve. Learning vocabulary around HSK Level 4 and trying to output through conversation.

english.name: English
english.comment: Mainly getting used to English environments through listening.
english.detail: Started learning English in junior high school but didn't study seriously at the time. Currently exposed to English mainly through listening, inspired by English VTubers such as NIJISANJI EN. Although not studying systematically, aiming to improve understanding gradually through content I enjoy.
